---
name: SkillOnlyIntegration
summary: A Claude Skill without generic component
---

# SkillOnlyIntegration

This integration provides only a Claude Skill, no generic instructions.

## Description

Use this skill to test skill-only installation workflows.

## Features

- Skill-specific functionality
- No generic markdown component
- Claude Code marketplace integration

## Usage

This skill can be installed independently using the --skill flag.
